com.iver.cit.gvsig.project.documents.view.toolListeners
Class AreaListener

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.tools.AreaListenerImpl
      com.iver.cit.gvsig.project.documents.view.toolListeners.AreaListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.tools.Listeners.PolylineListener, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.tools.Listeners.ToolListener
public class AreaListener
extends com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.tools.AreaListenerImpl

Listener for calculating the area of a polygon, defined in the associated MapControl object.

Moves the extent of the associated MapControl object according the movement between the initial and final points of the line determined by the movement dragged with the third button of the mouse.

Updates the status bar of the main frame of the application with the current area.

Author:
Vicente Caballero Navarro
